metadata.title: USN-3494-1 -- XML::LibXML vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that XML::LibXML incorrectly handled memory when processing a replaceChild call. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3494-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libxml-libxml-perl - 2.0108+dfsg-1ubuntu0.2 No subscription required
